label: NASHAZPHONE

title_full:
Alvin Lucier

label: Important Records
description:
Posthumous testament to the peerless vision of Alvin Lucier, split with a work by Jordan Dykstra (Dirty Projectors, Atlas Sound), who also hailed from the same Middletown, CT where Lucier wrote his seminal piece ‘I Am Sitting In A Room’.

Billy Bultheel & Alexander Iezzi aka 33’s killer debut LP of sharp cuts between hardcore rave, DIY classical chamber music, Trance arps and performance art punk - think a Duma throwdown with Diamanda Galas and yr halfway there.

label: C.A.N.V.A.S.
description:
Chrome-plated sound design and bristling textures frame the latest speculative sci-fi experiment from Xao, meshing sonic concepts inspired by Rabit, Visionist and Lotic into the cybernetic scapes of Hyph11E or Algorave proponent Renick Bell. 

Xao has been working alongside the C.A.N.V.A.S. label since the beginning, and his second album builds on the promise of... more

Contemporary Balinese gamelan master Dewa Alit leads his large ensemble on a discretely inventive fusion of traditional styles for their 2nd enchanting turn with Black Truffle

label: AD 93
description:
C.A.N.V.A.S. alum and Actress collaborator Olan Monk shifts to AD93 for this lo-fi pop gem, continuing the open-hearted outsider strangeness of last year's "Auto Life".

title_full:
Valentina Magaletti & Yves Chaudouët

label: Un Je Ne Sais Quoi Records
description:
Valentina Magaletti (Raime, Moin, CZN, Tomaga) plays the porcelain objects of Yves Chadouët with incredible, sometimes terrifying results.
